thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: Karina Robbins

author: Karina Robbins
title: Karina Robbins
text: Always great products. Only negative is the slow shipping compared to other companies. Unless you are a huge production company it's hard to keep things stocked so I order as needed. Never have I received my item next day. It's always 3 or more days. One item was over a week. That slows me down. Otherwise this is the place to get the best products.
